title: Active Learning-Based Microlearning Course for Engineering Design Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Intensive mobile-based training program to strengthen design competencies applicable to professional practitioners' work

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply a 5-stage design process (problem definition-concept design-detailed design-production-testing) in mobile environments.
Learners can solve real-case design problems with 80% or higher accuracy through online collaboration with peers.
Learners can improve and develop self-designed projects three or more times according to assessment rubric criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
